data.name: Frozen Flame
data.detailed_description:
Frozen Flame — multiplayer online action RPG with unusual gaming mechanics. Players will explore the Arcana world, learn the flame magic and constantly fight for the right to stay alive. Time is limited there and you need to try to find a way out before the cataclysm comes. Death is not the end here, but a beginning of a new story.

Explore the mysterious world



Explore a large open world filled with epic artifacts and secrets to uncover. Find memory stones to learn lost knowledge and recall the past. Through the calamity of chaos, only a few humans and dragons were able to survive its destruction. Meet various characters that'll help guide you on your quest to the right path.

The planet remains cursed and is filled with monsters that have gone mad by their obsession and thirst for the flame's unmatched power. The most dangerous creatures lurk in the depths of dark dungeons, where death awaits at every turn.

Master the magic flame



Battle to obtain a legendary flame and become stronger. The flame will allow you to improve your statistics, acquire new equipment and rule nature’s forces. Evolution will change the character’s appearance.

Find your way to victory or become cursed and lose the power of the flame. There is a flexible class system, craft, and building. Also, there are dynamic third look battles, an option to float high in the sky and climb the walls.

Stop the Cataclysm



In the end, you have to survive the cataclysm and unbearable cold. If you get through this you will be able to fight one of the legendary dragons and get timeless items as a reward.

There is a new cycle after every cataclysm. On part of the progress is saved and you will face a particular event according to your previous actions. Everytime you will explore something new. The ultimate goal is to find a way to prevent the cataclysm and escape this vicious circle.

Team up with allies



Play on your own, with friends or enter one of the ancient orders. Level up your reputation to unlock new opportunities. Each order has its own goals, like hunting the ancient artifacts, confronting other people or saving the survivors.

Join servers of different difficulty, playtime, and maximum of players. Despite that about the hundred players can test the fate at once, but only the most experienced and courageous will overcome.

data.short_description: Survivors can still be found among the ruins, but the power of their flames have perished. The world of dragons was captured by the corrupted and now it appears on the verge of destruction. Reveal the ancient secrets, master magical artifacts, find allies and stop the darkness before it’s too late!

  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
